title: A nice2bed1bath, Hdwd, HCeiling, No Fee, Sep 1st
posting_body: Utilities: tenants pay for gas, electricity and cable
The apartment is on first floor and having high ceiling, it gets a lot of lights.
It has a nice living room, kitchen, pantry with washer and dryer (free).
In your email, please tell us about you and your group.
Showings only Wed evenings and Sundays.
Location is one block from Brighton Mills shopping center, Star Market.
Premier commuter location close to Storrow dr., Mass Pike and Harvard University (HBS).

Excellent public transportation, property is accessible to the 70, 70A, 86 and 66 bus lines (commute to BU and MIT, 8 min bus ride to Harvard Sq or Central Sq), walking distance to HBS, and 2 minutes to MassPike/HWY90.
•	Range / Oven / Refrigerator / Microwave / Dishwasher / Laundry in unit
